(especially in Muslim countries) a way of greeting someone by bending low from the waist with the front of the right hand against the top of the face: There were no salaams, not even a handshake as he introduced us. He shook hands with several of the boys and exchanged farewell salaams with others.
PhotosIndia.com/photosindia/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
(especially in Muslim countries) greetings: When you meet him, give my salaams to him. Please convey our salaams to all our friends.
More examplesFewer examples"He will not return my salaam," he said.The man conveyed his salaam to the girl's parents.They send you their salaam.
